Title: Prohibits the possession and use of live ammunition at a film production facility or a qualified film production facility
Summary: Prohibits the possession and use of live ammunition at a film production facility or a qualified film production facility; requires all persons employed or present at a film production facility or a qualified film production facility to receive proper training on the safe use, handling, storage and transportation of firearms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the possession and use of live ammunition at a film production facility or a qualified film production facility
